name: Banana Explosion.
description:
"10/10" - Everyone

Left click to shoot.

If you want a real gamer challenge, enable "Hardcore gamer mode" in the in-game setting and click restart.

Sources :

Music : "Unser Kaiserhaus", "True To The Flag", "Kaiser Friedrich" - United States Marine Band (Youtube Sound Library)

Sound Effects : https://www.zapsplat.com/

Font : https://www.1001freefonts.com/ (OldNewspaperTypes)

Images :  menu map https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&url=https%3A%2F%2Flibraries.indiana.edu%2Fdigiti..., gamemap https://imgur.com/gallery/65bcZTT, gear https://fr.depositphotos.com/34762207/stock-photo-real-stainless-steel-gears-isolated.html, camo https://kknews.cc/zh-sg/fashion/y3e8pyg.html, bullet http://www.aljanh.net/bullets/, gun https://www.pinterest.cl/amp/pin/600878775255038900/, explosion https://ya-webdesign.com/image/bullet-sprite-png/474251.html

Made by Aubry Vincent for Quarantine Jam.
